website_summaries.verdict: A budget speed chute that is the perfect price for home or youth use for training.
pros: Strap can be adjusted for different body sizes including young adults
Connecting strap remains secure even during ability exercises that involve a lot of turns
Folds down to easily fit into included carrying bag
cons: Parachute fabric can start to tear after heavy use or in bad weather

customer_reviews.title: Not effective, does not provide resistance.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product to use for my players on the travel softball team I coached, needless to say it was ineffective. This parachute did not challenge my players in any way and it simply did not perform the way I expected. I highly recommend investing in a higher quality brand that you are certain to get results from. This was not simple to figure out, it took my players several minuets to figure out how to put this chute on, they even mentioned several times they thought it was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Adrena Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love It! Look up agility ladder drills on youtube and you will get a great sweat! I use it mostly indoors but I bet outdoors would be much more fun. Calves and glutes hurt, but I am happy overall! Get the elastic bands and wear them to practice squats and lunges and get an extra burn! Drills for 5 minutes non-stop and you will get a good workout. Recommended for beginners and ones who want to improve their cardiovascular strength as well as your coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Neyra

customer_reviews.title: haven't used it yet
customer_reviews.text: well I am not sure yet.. cause we only tried it out once.. but it wasn't a good test.. haven't had time otherwise..
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Brown

customer_reviews.title: No resistance
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product is terrible. It doesn't do anything it says it does. We tried this on all of my kids and my husband ranging in weight from 50-220 lbs and it gave no resistance Too small and too light to give any resistance training.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy&Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great agility tool for football players.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great agility tool for my youth football team. I tend not to spike it down because I found when the ladder is spiked down there were more tripping accidents. I used the ladder for various drills and have seen improvements in my players catching ability because it teaches them not to focus on your feet and pay more attention to their hands.
customer_reviews.author: Water Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Stitching is very weak, so be sure to have ...
customer_reviews.text: Stitching is very weak, so be sure to have your boys run far apart from each other. I didn't, and one of the boys stepped on one of the other boys' chute, which tore the stitching on the belt that goes around the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheaply made. It lasted me about a month. Big issue was also the velcro kept coming apart in the stitches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: One of the seams of the parachute was detached from the inside part when we opened it, so it didn't act like a parachute when my son used it. Very disappointed because it was a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: emjay0325

customer_reviews.title: Made well but I ordered a adult small for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Made well but I ordered a adult small for my 2 young boys (8 and 10). No hold back at all . Absolutely 0 resistants. Maybe a larger size will produce some results but definitely not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.author: Trent_Crew

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My kid likes it. Not the best in windy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Comes in a nice travel bag
customer_reviews.text: This was a little big for what we are using it for (ice skating speed drills), but it works the way it is meant to work. Comes in a nice travel bag. It is a little on the flimsy side and sometimes you need to hold it open to make sure it opens correctly when you move.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Moffitt

customer_reviews.title: Tether seems too short
customer_reviews.text: Well made but it seems the tether is too short. It doesn't seem to gather as much air as possible with it being so close in so the resistance isn't where it should be.

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest, most poorly made chute I have ever used. It literally fell apart the first time I used it.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for soccer or any

customer_reviews.title: Other reviews here say " it's like running with plastic bag behind me" and that is ...
customer_reviews.text: This provides no noticeable resistance. It does make my 5yr old son run faster because he likes to see it flying off of the ground behind him. It doesn't slow him down or create resistance at all. I tried it myself and I can't feel anything. Other reviews here say " it's like running with plastic bag behind me" and that is very accurate. I didn't read the reviews before purchasing and I got burned. Save the 10 bucks or so, you would have spent on this and invest on one that has better reviews and is larger.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Poor Construction, Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly constructed, one time use and connector strap unraveled and detached while running. I suppose for 9.99 I got what I paid for an this being a first time purchase I do not have another to compare to but I would not at all recommend this product and seek higher quality elsewhere. Overall, Low price, poor construction, does not last more than one use. Avoid this product

product_meta.title: AGPTEK 56 inch Speed Training Resistance Parachute Running Chute Power (Large)
product_meta.description: AGPtekresistance parachute is a special item to improve your run speed and strength.When you use the drag chute to exercise, the resistance of the air will produce an backward drag force, so the faster you run, the greater the drag force. Through this exercise, can improve the ability of the user's acceleration, muscle endurance, and enhance the ability to adjust the direction of the high-speed running. It can be widely used in training track and field, running ball games, cycling, skating and other projects.
feature_bullets: 56" diameter, 25-35 lbs of resistance. Also available in Medium (48") and Large (56")
Fits all sizes (up to a 42" waist), Quick Release for overspeed training.
Fully functional unit includes parachute and belt. It can help you to practice muscel endurance e, acceleration and running speed.
Our drogue chute with an easy-to-carry bag is storable and portable, so that users can bring it everywhere.
One parachute is better for long-distance running. You can add two or more chute to increace resistance.
